snippet: Sought by the police in Belize as a "person of interest" in the investigation of a neighbor's murder, the technology legend John McAfee has moved his noisy life underground.
abstract: Sought by the police in Belize as a "person of interest" in the investigation of a neighbor's murder, the technology legend John McAfee has moved his noisy life underground.

headline.main: John McAfee Plays Hide-and-Seek in Belize
